alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 11:31PM CST until January 08 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast South Dakota and west central Minnesota. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Areas along the eastern ridge of the Prairie Coteau will see the greatest potential for reduced visibilities. If you have travel plans, especially along I-29 near Summit, please use caution as visibilities may rapidly decrease in locations receiving blowing snow.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
